Posts.Content:
Hello, 
I am 27 year old female, A couple of years ago I found a small lump in my right breast. I was very concerned with it at the time as my mother died from breast cancer when I was 18 years old. 
So I went to my Dr right away and had an ultrasound done. They said it was just a cyst and non cancerous, but because of my family history they think I should get an ultrasound recheck every 6 months just to keep an eye on it. 
So I've been getting these ultrasounds twice a year for a couple of years, always the same result, until my last one, they found a new lump. The new lump though they assured me was also nothing to worry about
, and to just come in, in another 6 months to have a recheck.
My question is... is an ultrasound enough? Should I be asking for a mammogram? or anything else? 
Any advice or opinions would be greatly appreciated, thanks in advance =)
Posts.Title: Looking for advice on a couple of lumps

Posts.Content: Well thank you very much for responding, Im a bit of a worry wart... so I wanted to make sure I was doing as much as I should.
Posts.Title: Looking for advice on a couple of lumps
